snippet: Sudan and South Sudan moved to reduce the hostilities that have severely weakened both of their economies.
abstract: Sudan and South Sudan, moving to reduce hostilities that have severely weakened both of their economies, sign agreement that could lead to resumption of oil production.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York

lead_paragraph: Sudan and South Sudan moved to reduce the hostilities that have severely weakened both of their economies.

headline.seo: Sudan and South Sudan Agree to Resume Oil Production
headline.main: Sudans Sign Agreement to Resume Oil Exports
headline.print_headline: Sudans Sign Agreement To Resume Oil Exports
